skins.shipDescription: Benson class Destroyer¡ª Hobby, hull number DD-610.
skins.selfIntroduction: Eagle Union Destroyer DD610, Hobby has arrived! Usually, Hobby is too busy to have an outstanding battle record. Also, Hobby used to be a child star who also starred in movies~ Surprised?
skins.acquisition: The one and only Hobby has arrived! Commander, Commander! Are you ready to be impressed by my charm? Hehe~
skins.login: Welcome back Commander! Did you come back because you missed Hobby?
skins.details: Hobby is ready with her POSE! Commander, did you take a good photo?
skins.secretaryIdle1: It¡¯s no big deal that Destroyers can be normal, Hobby, lives a happy lifestyle~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Whether it¡¯s her name or characteristics, Hobby is truly unique~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, if you don¡¯t have a camera with you, just use your hand to mimic a frame for cute little Hobby.
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you need my help? Just say so, maybe Hobby will even become the Commander¡¯s savior~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, you¡¯re really bold¡­ then let us skip ABCD and go directly to EFG tonight¡­ haha, blushes, just kidding! (Wiggles tongue).
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Hehe, feels good? Well, you can pet me for a while longer.

skins.shipDescription: Here comes the debut of school uniform Hobby~ Commander, how do I look? Hobby is all grown up~
skins.acquisition: Here comes the debut of school uniform Hobby~ Commander, how do I look? Hobby is all grown up~
skins.login: Commander, HELLO! Accompany Hobby to class today~ Relax, we still got plenty of time for the road~
skins.details: Are you taking a closer look at all of Hobby¡¯s changes? Hey! Commander, ready your camera, take as many pics as you like!
skins.secretaryIdle1: My backpack has a little Kalk puppet? Yes~ She is my close friend. Even though she likes to play pranks, but you should get along with her Commander~
skins.secretaryIdle2: If Hobby becomes the ¡°mind¡± of the fleet, then will Commander like her more?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, Commander~ Let¡¯s go together. Is Hobby as cute as ever today?
skins.secretaryTouch: Hobby is the best at sharing the workload of the Commander, on call at anytime~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, if it goes on like this, then Mr. torpedo will not let you go¡ª¡ª haha, don¡¯t be afraid Commander, I¡¯m just kidding~
